Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to activities permitted in premises licensed for adult-use on-premises consumption of cannabis
Summary: Permits certain activities in premises licensed for adult-use on-premises consumption of cannabis including the sale of food, non-alcoholic beverages and entertainment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to permitting additional business activities on the premises where cannabis is sold for adult-use on-premises consumption
